SummarAIze: Your AI-Powered Productivity Companion

SummarAIze is a cutting-edge browser extension designed to streamline your online research, writing, and data management tasks. By leveraging the power of artificial intelligence, SummarAIze transforms how you interact with digital content, making your workflow faster, smarter, and more efficient.

Key Features:
Smart Summarization: Quickly extract the main ideas from any webpage or article. SummarAIze condenses lengthy content into concise summaries, helping you save time while ensuring you grasp the core concepts.

Contextual Rewriting: Need to reframe or refine your text? SummarAIze provides editable dropdowns for context-based rewriting, ensuring your output aligns with your specific goals and tone.

Customizable API Settings: Tailor SummarAIze to your needs by adjusting settings for summarization type, format, and length. Whether you need detailed insights or a quick overview, the control is in your hands.

Local Data Storage: All your generated summaries and rewritten content are stored locally using Chrome Storage. Access your saved content anytime, with options to view, edit titles, or delete entries.

Sync Across Devices: If Chrome Sync is enabled, your stored data is accessible across all your devices, ensuring seamless productivity whether you're on your desktop, laptop, or mobile device.

Clipboard Integration: Easily copy summaries or rewritten content to your clipboard with a single click, enabling quick sharing and use in other applications.

Dark Mode: Work comfortably in any lighting condition with SummarAIze's intuitive dark mode toggle, seamlessly switching between light and dark themes.

Language Customization: Summarize or rewrite text in your preferred language. With translation-enabled settings, SummarAIze adapts to your linguistic needs, defaulting to English for universal accessibility.

Simple, Focused Design: SummarAIze prioritizes usability with a distraction-free interface, keeping all tools within easy reach while maintaining a clean and professional design.
